thread.section_title: trivago Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of trivago | trivago.com
thread.title: Holly Gibbs

author: Holly Gibbs
title: Holly Gibbs
text: I found Trivago easy to use, but on check out I reviewed all the info, it was correct but when I printed out the reservation they had moved me to the hotel next door. The hotel next door was not comparable to the B&B I had tried to book and it did not ask me before doing so. I had to cancel the reservation and it cost me $30 to do so. The hotel it sent me to doesn't even have a working phone number.
